name: Mustang Survival Taku Jacket - Men's
description: This versatile, streamlined jacket is built for salt-water settings. The functional hood turns as your head turns, so you can see your surroundings. The 3-layer waterproof-breathable fabric has a non-porous internal membrane to let body moisture out without letting water in. Light and functional, the design has good mobility for paddling or on-land activity.MarineSpec SP fabric is waterproof and breathable, specifically designed for tough salt-water environments.YKK® Vislon zipper closes smoothly with a chin guard and storm flap behind.Articulated elbows and shoulders provide great mobility.Adjustable hood allows full peripheral vision.2 zippered hand pockets and 1 zippered sleeve pocket.Neoprene cuffs keep out water with Velcro® adjustments.Drop hem.
